column4: Can anyone recommend a laptop for Ubuntu suitable for general office productivity, very light gaming and web-surfing? Sort of a dualcore 1GB RAM 200GB drive with internal wireless and at least semi-decent looks?
Anything made by lenovo is great for Linux. :)
I am using T61, can not be happier. :)
unfortunately a bit too expensive as well, from what i've seen - kinda looking for something around the Â£400ish mark
